column5: BCLI Next potential news event should generate National news supportprnewswirecomnewsrelease

BCLI Holding long and strong This is nothing Ill be honest and this might be the same for many of us invested in BCLI I could have sold my entire position and made money elsewhere but the uncertainty of what this could become in a short period has me holding my position I believe in the science and management has put themselves in a position to succeed I think eyes are on the stock and waiting for P3 ALS results before buying Until then Ill remain stubbornly loyal
BCLI In the meantime while we are waiting how about we claw back some of that 1million total compensation were paying Chaim to pretty much do nothing by way of promoting SH value That will save a ton
BCLI This is what will happen Its either youre in or youre out They wont move this until concrete definitive proof of efficacy or chance of FDA approval
BCLI Its a gut check now Are you ready to ride it out
